references.paper_title: A Marketplace for Data: An Algorithmic Solution
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the concept of data marketplaces and uses the Shapley value for data allocation, a central concept in this paper.

references.paper_title: Feature Selection Based on the Shapley Value
references.reason: This paper introduces the application of the Shapley value to feature selection, demonstrating its utility in ML problems related to dataset valuation.

references.paper_title: Data Shapley: Equitable Valuation of Data for Machine Learning
references.reason: This paper proposes Data Shapley, a method for data valuation using the Shapley value, which is directly relevant to the dataset valuation problem.
This seminal paper introduces the Shapley value, the core theoretical foundation upon which the dataset valuation method in this paper is based.
This paper introduces the multilinear extension of games, a concept used to approximate the Shapley value, providing a key mathematical tool for efficient calculation.
